item.title: Date Night : What should we watch tonight?
item.author: Author
item.description: Have you ever struggled finding the perfect movie to watch? Thanks to Date Night, finally the answer to, “What should we watch tonight?”. What should we watch tonight? Date Night helps allows you and your loved one to select each one a movie you like and in return will suggest a result that should suits both of you. Let’s say you want to watch, Jaws and your wife wants to watch Notting Hill (yeah, that’s very cliché) :
